name: Nuri Slots - Lightning Fever
description:
■◇ Best Free Slot Machine Game!◇■
Enjoy Vegas Casino style slots on your smartphone, for free!
High-res HD graphics and realistic sounds to captivate your eyes and ears!
Nuri Slots boasts the best winning rate and overall experience! Enjoy it anytime, anywhere with a single touch!

■◇■ Themes ■◇■
High completeness of themes that have never been seen before! More themes will be available in later updates!

■■■ Key Features ■■■
※ 100% Free game!
New theme updated, 100% Free and you can enjoy the game with free coins that accumulate over time!

※ The highest winning ratio you've ever seen!
It will give you exhilarating joy with a high winning rate you have never seen in any other video slots!

※ Full network! 3G & Wi-Fi fully enjoy all the online environment!
‘Nuri slots' support for both 3G and Wi-Fi networks. Now you can enjoy a pleasant game anywhere, anytime!

※ Abundant joy of variety themes!
Variously balanced paytable and the winning rate gives you not just a simple graphical changes but, the exhilaration of victory!

※ Rank up the Global Rankings Leaderboards !
*Download today to become the new king of Las Vegas slots, play for top dollar winnings and high scores!

※Fever Mode!!
*Nurislots is always changing. Fever mode that we add, make you feel amazing winninig.
*Thrilling fun of Fever mode.
*Please get new Fever symbol!! Huge bonus prize is waiting for you.
